Convention & Banquet Sales

This course offers a hands-on approach to sales and negotiation competencies, applied to catering and convention services. The aim is to enable students to understand and apply the concepts of sales management principles and industry practices in the classroom discussions. This course will teach the skills needed to use software required to manage sales and catering system to perform room booking, create Banquet Event Order (BEOs) etc.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Explain the role of ‘Sales and Marketing’ in convention and hospitality related events.

+  Summarize the convention and banquet set-up, production, service planning and preparation.

+  Conducting sales and controlled negotiation by using a systematic process.

+  Implementing tier-pricing strategies (differential pricing and market segmentation).

+  Use software to handle key MICE organization functions (room booking, BEO, floor plan).
